articles.title: Drake Maye shares what he knows about new Broncos starting QB Jarrett Stidham
articles.description:
"I wish him the best of luck and looking forward to seeing how he does. Hopefully we come out with a win."

articles.description:

articles.title: ESPN’s Dan Orlovsky trolls Patriots defense after win over Texans
articles.description:

articles.title: Jarrett Stidham hasn’t thrown a pass in an NFL game since 2023, but that doesn’t mean he’s an unknown to the Patriots
articles.description:

articles.title: Celtics’ Derrick White is picking Broncos over Patriots in AFC championship game
articles.description:

articles.title: Former Boston College head coach Jeff Hafley reaches agreement with Miami Dolphins, AP source says
articles.description:
The 46-year-old Hafley left his job at Boston College in 2024 to become defensive coordinator in Green Bay, where he worked with new Miami GM Jon-Eric Sullivan for the past two seasons.

The post Former Boston College head coach Jeff Hafley reaches agreement with Miami Dolphins, AP source says appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Rex Ryan thinks Bill Belichick is a ‘name to watch’ for Bills’ head coaching role
articles.description:
Buffalo fired Sean McDermott on Monday morning, instantly setting off speculation about several potential candidates. Ryan, himself a former Bills HC, put Belichick's name forward.

The post Rex Ryan thinks Bill Belichick is a ‘name to watch’ for Bills’ head coaching role appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Kayshon Boutte’s touchdown grab may rank with some of the great catches in NFL history
articles.description:
Boutte’s catch — one of his three, for 75 yards, on a day when Patriots receivers came through repeatedly even with limited opportunities — was a thing of beauty amid a brawl.
